segments.text: I think you made the right choice , coming to us.We have a wide selection of vehicles you can choose from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to rent a car with a good stereo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All our cars have stereos in them.Stereos , air conditioning . It's all standard with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I am here visiting my girlfriend . I want her to have a good time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , is that so ? Well , then . Let me show you something she might like . It's on our back lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I probably can't afford it . It must be really expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , sir . You said you were looking at cars at the rental agency at the airport.Now with them you'd spend your money and get nothing for it.But you could probably rent this Porsche from us , for the same price as one of their standard cars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But how can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's because our prices are so good.And this car has a lot of miles on it . But it's in nice shape , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1
